Cherry_leaf_00004.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has serrated edges and a heart-shaped base. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole is thin and reddish-brown in color.

Cherry_leaf_00007.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a serrated edge and a prominent central vein. There are no visible damages on the leaf, and the petiole appears to be thin and green.

Cherry_leaf_00006.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a smooth texture. It has a serrated edge and a prominent vein running from the base to the tip. There are no visible damages, holes, or tears on the leaf. The petiole is thin and appears to be of a similar green color to the leaf.

Cherry_leaf_00003.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped or ovate shape. The edges of the leaf are serrated. There are no visible damages, and the veins are of a lighter shade, possibly white or light green. The petiole appears to be thin and slightly reddish in color.

Cherry_leaf_00008.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and serrated edges. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole appears to be thin and green.

Cherry_leaf_00002.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and serrated edges. The petiole is thin and green. There are no visible damages, spots, or discolorations on the leaf. The veins are visible and are of a lighter green color.

Cherry_leaf_00001.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and serrated edges. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole appears to be thin and green.

Cherry_leaf_00010.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a serrated edge. There are no visible damages, and the veins are thin and light-colored. The petiole is thin and green.

Cherry_leaf_00005.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. It has a heart-shaped base and a serrated edge. The leaf has a few visible veins, and there are no visible damages or spots on it. The petiole is thin and green in color.

Cherry_leaf_00009.jpg.text: The leaf is predominantly red with some greenish hues. It has a smooth texture with a slightly serrated edge. The veins are visible, running from the base to the tip of the leaf. The petiole is thin and appears to be of a reddish-brown color.
